statements: SELECT researcher_name, biofuel_used FROM Bioenergy_Research;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, greenhouse_gas_emissions FROM Bioenergy_Research;
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Research;
SELECT researcher_id, biofuel_used, greenhouse_gas_emissions FROM Bioenergy_Research;
SELECT researcher_name, greenhouse_gas_emissions FROM Bioenergy_Research WHERE greenhouse_gas_emissions > 100;
SELECT researcher_name, biofuel_used FROM Bioenergy_Research WHERE greenhouse_gas_emissions > 50 ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Bioenergy_Research WHERE researcher_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT researcher_name, biofuel_used, greenhouse_gas_emissions FROM Bioenergy_Research WHERE biofuel_used='Ethanol' ORDER BY greenhouse_gas_emissions DESC
SELECT researcher_name, biofuel_used FROM Bioenergy_Research WHERE greenhouse_gas_emissions BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT biofuel_used) AS unique_biofuels_count FROM Bioenergy_Research
SELECT researcher_name, greenhouse_gas_impact FROM research_data;
SELECT biofuel_type, researcher_name, greenhouse_gas_impact FROM research_data ORDER BY greenhouse_gas_impact DESC;
SELECT * FROM bioenergy_sources WHERE carbon_intensity < 50;
SELECT source_name, production_region FROM bioenergy_sources WHERE production_region = 'Europe';
SELECT researcher_name, biofuel_type FROM research_data WHERE biofuel_type = 'Ethanol';
SELECT researcher_name, biofuel_type FROM research_data WHERE greenhouse_gas_impact > 0.5 ORDER BY greenhouse_gas_impact DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE biofuel_type = 'Biodiesel' AND researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT research_id, researcher_name, biofuel_type, greenhouse_gas_impact FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY greenhouse_gas_impact ASC;
SELECT source_name, carbon_intensity, production_region FROM bioenergy_sources WHERE carbon_intensity < 2.0 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data JOIN bioenergy_sources ON research_data.biofuel_type = bioenergy_sources.source_name WHERE research_data.greenhouse_gas_impact < 0.5 ORDER BY research_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BioenergyResearcher;
SELECT name, institution FROM BioenergyResearcher WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT institution FROM BioenergyResearcher ORDER BY institution ASC;
SELECT research_field FROM BioenergyResearcher WHERE institution='MIT';
SELECT id, name, institution, research_field FROM BioenergyResearcher WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM BioenergyResearcher WHERE institution = 'Harvard University';
SELECT id, name FROM BioenergyResearcher WHERE research_field = 'Biochemistry' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT institution, COUNT(*) AS researchers_count FROM BioenergyResearcher GROUP BY institution HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT R.name AS researcher_name, C.id AS colleague_id FROM BioenergyResearcher R JOIN ResearcherConnections RC ON R.id = RC.researcher_id JOIN BioenergyResearcher C ON RC.colleague_id = C.id;
SELECT biofuel_type, AVG(greenhouse_gas_emissions) AS avg_emissions FROM BiofuelsData WHERE date < '2021-01-01' GROUP BY biofuel_type ORDER BY avg_emissions DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers;
SELECT biofuel_id, biofuel_name, carbon_intensity FROM Biofuels;
SELECT emission_id, biofuel_id, greenhouse_gas, emission_amount FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions;
SELECT result_id, researcher_id, biofuel_id, emission_id, result_description FROM ResearchResults;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Researchers
SELECT institution, researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT biofuel_name, carbon_intensity FROM Biofuels ORDER BY carbon_intensity DESC
SELECT emission_amount, greenhouse_gas FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE biofuel_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT result_description FROM ResearchResults WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM biofuels WHERE biofuel_type='Biodiesel';
SELECT researcher_name, emission_amount FROM researchers JOIN emissions ON researchers.researcher_id = emissions.researcher_id;
SELECT biofuel_type, biofuel_source FROM biofuels WHERE biofuel_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_area='Renewable Energy';
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT biofuel_type, biofuel_source FROM biofuels WHERE biofuel_type='Biodiesel' OR biofuel_type='Ethanol';
SELECT researchers.researcher_name, emissions.emission_amount FROM researchers JOIN emissions ON researchers.researcher_id = emissions.researcher_id WHERE emissions.emission_amount > 100;
SELECT gas_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM greenhouse_gases JOIN gas_emissions ON greenhouse_gases.gas_id = gas_emissions.gas_id GROUP BY gas_name ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
